title: Hello Pocatello, anyone know this font?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009110241im_/http:/typophile.com/files/lies-font_5601.gif)

It can also be seen on the Brass Tacks Design website, I have been trying to figure out what font it is and is driving me crazy.

Any input would be helpful.

Cheers.

 [‹ Capitolium?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009110241/http:/typophile.com/node/50156 "Go to previous forum topic") [puls tv ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009110241/http:/typophile.com/node/50151 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jim_

comments.content: It might be one of HTF’s [Knockout](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009110241/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_styles.php?productLineID=100013) variations.

Thank you Vivicity for the prompt reply. I also thought at first that it could be Knockout variations, but if you look closer there are differences on the “R” and a few other characters. However, you may be right, Titling Gothic highly resembles most, if not all, characters.

Many thanks!

Could this be the same font as that Feltron annual report (Opti Giant I think)?

- Lex

Nah, Giant has a different ’G’ and circular punctuation among other things.

- Lex

Hey Lex,

They look pretty similar also, but you’re right, there are some small differences.

So far, Titling seems to resemble it the most, I hope it is for the sake of my sanity!

Cheers.
